casebody.data:
No. 10-5073. Christopher Everson, Petitioner v. Brian K. Murphy, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, et al. 562 U.S. 1055, 131 S. Ct. 628,

178 L. Ed. 2d 456,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9027. November 15, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 902, 131 S. Ct. 237, 178 L. Ed. 2d 158, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 6209.
